typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		CategoryID as integer,
		QuantityPerUnit as string,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitsInStock as integer,
		UnitsOnOrder as integer,
		ReorderLevel as integer,
		Discontinued as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NorthwindProducts
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		Product_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubProducts
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NorthwindOrderDetails
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubOrders
source(output(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		RecordSource as string,
		LoadDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVLinkOrderDetails
NorthwindProducts, DVHubProducts join(ProductID == Product_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts
JoinProducts select(mapColumn(
		ProductName,
		Product_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSatProducts
SelectSatProducts derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = 'Northwind') ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte1
NorthwindOrderDetails, DVHubOrders join(OrderID == Order_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrders
JoinOrders, DVHubProducts join(ProductID == Product_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts1
JoinProducts1, DVLinkOrderDetails join(DVHubOrders@Order_SID == DVLinkOrderDetails@Order_SID
	&& DVHubProducts@Product_SID == DVLinkOrderDetails@Product_SID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLinkOrderDetails
JoinLinkOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		UnitPrice,
		Quantity,
		Link_Order_Details_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SeectOrderDetails
SeectOrderDetails derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = 'Northwind') ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte2
AbgeleiteteSpalte1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product_SID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_SID,
		ProductName,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> DVSatProducts
AbgeleiteteSpalte2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Link_Order_Details_SID,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> DVSatOrderDetails
